text: did you maybe overdo it just a little
bit during the holidays I know that I
did you know just a little
that's why January is salad month for me
but not just any old salad I want to
make a really hearty delicious salad
that's substantial enough for dinner but
yet light enough to balance things out
shall we say I love a substantial salad
when it has croutons in it they just
bulk it out and then give it a little
bit more heft
so for these I'm going to add some
garlic oil I just heated up the oil just
a little bit with some crushed garlic
cloves once it starts to smell fragrant
like garlic pour that right on top of my
croutons and then I have grated Parmesan
cheese see how big the pieces are that's
important because when this goes into
the oven the cheese is going to turn
into these crisp little cheesy fritters
which are really delicious and of course
salt and pepper I'm gonna toss this
together clean hands of course I've used
a whole grain bread here because it's
better for you a little more crunchy
it's got a textural contrast with all
those whole grains so I'm just gonna
bake these until they are nice and
crunchy about 15 minutes now I'm gonna
make the dressing and I'm gonna mix it
right in the salad bowl this is sherry
vinegar and some salt and pepper and I'm
gonna add about two tablespoons or so of
a little stir and now I'm gonna add a
persimmon to my salad I want a little
bit of sweetness and it's persimmon
season and it's so pretty you want to
use one of these squat for you
persimmons because these are good at any
stage if they're hard and crunchy
they're still sweet so you just want to
take the top off just gonna quarter it
by the way you don't have to peel these
the skin is perfectly edible tastes fine
and then over here I have prosciutto and
prosciutto is great because it's salty
and it goes really well with the
sweetness of the persimmon my lovely
baby spinach is gonna go straight on top
of this so good for you and so tasty I'm
also gonna just fish out the garlic it
has done its job and then if the
croutons go into the bowl you toss this
just want to make sure that there's
enough dressing to coat on I think some
people like their salad very lightly
dressed other people really like a lot
of dressing this is the kind of thing
you just need to customize to your taste
normally this salad would feed about
four to six people but this is gonna be
my dinner so 2/3 maximum this is a nice
light post holiday meal but it's not too
light
